thread.title: New Year’s Wishes: Health, Happiness - And An End To War | Local News | caledonianrecord.com
thread.title_full: New Year’s Wishes: Health, Happiness - And An End To War | Local News | caledonianrecord.com

author: Amy Ash Nixon nixona@caledonian-record.com Staff Writer
title: New Year’s Wishes: Health, Happiness - And An End To War | Local News | caledonianrecord.com
text: ST. JOHNSBURY - Wishes for the coming New Year shared with The Caledonian-Record span from the global spectrum. From wishes to be cancer-free to an end of war. People shared their hopes and wishes with me as I strolled around downtown St. Johnsbury the day after Christmas, and also responded to an online question posted for readers in the North Country of New Hampshire and Northeast Kingdom of Vermont for our annual New Year’s Eve poll. kAm• kDEC@?8mr@==66? r@=6k^DEC@?8m @7 |@C82?
